Reviews.Title: Sweet TV & Cheap!
Reviews.Author: Alex C. Fletcher "CannibalFletcher"
Reviews.Content: I'm in college and I wanted to get a small little TV for my room, and SHA-BAM this thing is awesome. I bought it being a little hesitant that it wouldn't be very good quality since it didn't have a 4 star rating or higher, which is what I like to see before I buy an amazon product. But it was a really good deal so I jumped on it anyway. It was a great decision! I hooked my ps3 up to it, play games and watch movies on it quite frequently. The picture quality and the overall build of the TV is definitely on the higher end. Plus as a little surprise added bonus the buttons on the TV are all touch sensitive which I thought was extremely cool!

Reviews.Title: Nice Little TV
Reviews.Author: Marlene P. Nice "offcenter"
Reviews.Content: This set is just what I wanted for my bedroom. It's easy to set up, has a nice picture and good sound. We have several Magnavox televisions and they've all been very reliable. I also like some of the features that Magnavox offers like the sound leveling.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Travis Smith
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to mount on a stand for use while using a treadmill.  Great little TV with a great picture...One of the reasons I wanted this TV was it's headphone jack...Which works great.Great little TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: charles stephanian
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and pretty good sound for such a small size. The only complaint I have is the viewing angles seem a bit too narrow.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Timothy F. McQuide
Reviews.Content: This tv was exactly as described. Size was perfect for the room I used it in - kitchen. It took a few tries to get the settings correct but when done the clarity and color are good. I would recommend this tv

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 22ME402V/F7 22-Inch 720p Class LED LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: William D. Lacy
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality picture, slim lightweight design that attached easily to the videosecu articulating mount that I also purchased to mount the TV.

Reviews.Title: television works fine. Packaging was bad.
Reviews.Author: CTT
Reviews.Content: I fault tne vendor for the way this package was shipped to me. The television was sent in its original box with no other protection. Holes were punctured in the box that, miraculously, did not puncture the TV screen. Two of the four corners of the box were also crushed in one eye opened the package the styrofoam protectors on the corners of the TV work crush inside. Again the television survived unscathed. I do not believe that I would pi another item from this vendor given that they do not packaged air items or give them any special care.

Reviews.Title: magnavox 22 inch tv
Reviews.Author: rick opitz
Reviews.Content: Great bargain . So far it works terrifically . I bought it used and it only has a few scratches on the back that no one can notice .

Reviews.Title: Perfect tv
Reviews.Author: Pamela R. DeMers
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for me.  It has a great picture and sound.  No problems at all.  And a great price!  Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Ron Wels
Reviews.Content: This is a good little tv for our gaming purposes. It has low power requirements, so being on for hour at a a time is not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jarom Hawkins
Reviews.Content: Great TV! I replaced my behemoth box TV for this one so i could have a computer and gaming console hooked up to it in order to conserve room. The picture quality is great for the price i paid for this. Only problem is the the base can wobble a bit, not enough for me to complain though. A good "bang for your buck"

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: David Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Kind of figured the screen would be small. But, the picture is beautiful and I love the HD look that it gives.

Reviews.Title: No complaints.
Reviews.Author: Kobe Fan
Reviews.Content: I probably should have ordered the next size up, but for the guest bedroom it's really fine. Picture's very sharp and with an inexpensive Target antenna and no cable (don't have cable in that room) you can get a good number of clear channels even from the bottom of the Hollywood Hills with obstructions everywhere. My next TV will be a "Smart TV" though.

Reviews.Title: Very slim and sleek. Now I actually wish I had gotten a bigger size because it is very sleek.
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Smith
Reviews.Content: Color is fabulous--crisp. Remote is easy. Very nice. If I were to buy again I'd get the 26 inch because the picture is so good you want it bigger immediately.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox LED
Reviews.Author: olga
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the quality of the Magnavox.  The set up took about 30 minutes, but it was very user friendly.  Great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: P. Mills
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my spare room and visitors but also usefull if my pc monator goes out. happy, happy, Win, Win!

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 22ME402V/F7 22" 720p Class LED LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: october1
Reviews.Content: I love the tv.  It is just what i wanted and the picture is magnificent.  It is just right for my viewing.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: HomeCoder
Reviews.Content: This TV works as advertised.  The menus are intuitive and easy to use.  You just hook up and use it.The picture looks fine.  I just wanted a simple TV for the kitchen and this fit the bill.

Reviews.Title: no sound plus wrong screws
Reviews.Author: Maurice Stewart
Reviews.Content: THE Magnavox 22ME402V/F7 22-Inch 720p Class LED LCD HDTV came with the wrong screws i tried over and over again to screw in the screws but they would not screw in plus there was no volume the sellers need to test there products real GOOD to make sure everything works correctly.

Reviews.Title: Not the actual TV.
Reviews.Author: vonnee sleighter
Reviews.Content: I never got to see what it could do because the trouble was all due to handling.  It came without the needed screws to attach the base. The first rep. I contacted laughed at me and said he had the same TV and I didn't even need the screws. I then tried another number and got a very helpful man named Garry in Oregon. He got in touch with Magnavox  and gave me a number to call. Which I did. A  nice woman took all the stats including the serial #. She assured me I would be receiving the screws soon..5 to 7 days. When they came there were only 2 screws. Ok, I then went to the local hardware store with the instruction sheet. There was no mention if they were metric or not. I came home and tried the ones we thought might fit.. to no avail. I packed it up (better than I received it) called Garry again he then e-mailed a shipping label and it was picked up. Now I have to return the unusable screws. Three weeks of hassle. It is too bad it came from a warehouse sale with AMAZON on the box. I will only order directly from Amazon or I will go somewhere else..which is what I did.From, SCREWED

Reviews.Title: Timely!
Reviews.Author: Pop
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted a set for the bedroom as I tend toward the History Channels and the Military one while she prefers the "lady" programs, so I ordered this one as a Mothers' Day gift.  The moment I ordered this new set, our existing one failed!  So, now we are using hers in the den while the 40" one is being repaired.  Picture quality is excellent, and the set is easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Craptacular Magnavox TV 22ME402V
Reviews.Author: Surprised
Reviews.Content: Bought it Cyber Monday. It came on Friday. I opened the box on Sunday and the only thing that worked was the remote. I want my money back NOW!

Convenient Side HDMI Input
SRS TruSurround XT / Doby Digital Output
Recognized as the Most Efficient of ENERGY STAR 2012
PC Input via VGA and HDMI Ports
